item.title: Introducing IFFâ€™s Connectivity Tracker #MapTheDigitalDivide
item.description: IFF is introducing its Connectivity Tracker, compiling available data related to connectivity each quarter, like: telecom subscriptions, internet connections, penetration rates, average data usage per user, and more. This edition contains data from Jan ‘20 to Aug ‘21.
